section.name: Release Notes - Jetspeed 2 - Version 2.1.3
section.p: The list below outlines the issues that are addressed with release 2.1.3 For a full list of features, see the features list.
And the release notes of the previous release 2.1.2 are available here: release notes 2.1.2.
